name: ConvertAPI
description:
Transform API Descriptions from/to various formats e.g., Swagger, API Blueprint, RAML, WADL, Google Discovery, I/O Docs.

### INPUTS
* API Blueprint
* Swagger 1.0 - 1.2
* Swagger 2.0 JSON
* Swagger 2.0 YAML
* WADL - W3C 2009
* Google Discovery
* RAML 0.8
* I/O Docs - Mashery
* HAR 1.2
* Postman Collection 1.0 - 2.0
* APIMATIC Format
* Mashape

### OUTPUTS
* API Blueprint
* Swagger 1.2
* Swagger 2.0 JSON
* Swagger 2.0 YAML
* WADL - W3C 2009
* RAML 0.8 - 1.0
* APIMATIC Format
